title: Fluid Mechanics
description: The fundamentals of fluid mechanics. Topics include fluid statics; control-volume analysis; the Navier-Stokes equations; similitude; viscous, inviscid and turbulent flows; boundary layers.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ME 2202 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 2220 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or NRE 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or NRE 3301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 3005 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PTFE 2200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (ME 3322 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 3411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and COE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
